<a id="GrooveJoint2D"></a>

# GrooveJoint2D

**Inherits:** [Joint2D](Joint2D.md) **\<** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A physics joint that restricts the movement of two 2D physics bodies to a fixed axis.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A physics joint that restricts the movement of two 2D physics bodies to a fixed axis. For example, a [StaticBody2D](StaticBody2D.md) representing a piston base can be attached to a [RigidBody2D](RigidBody2D.md) representing the piston head, moving up and down.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="GrooveJoint2D_property_initial_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **initial_offset** = `25.0` [ðŸ”—](#GrooveJoint2D_property_initial_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_initial_offset**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_initial_offset**\ (\ )

The body B's initial anchor position defined by the joint's origin and a local offset [initial_offset](GrooveJoint2D.md#GrooveJoint2D_property_initial_offset) along the joint's Y axis (along the groove).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GrooveJoint2D_property_length"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **length** = `50.0` [ðŸ”—](#GrooveJoint2D_property_length)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_length**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_length**\ (\ )

The groove's length. The groove is from the joint's origin towards [length](GrooveJoint2D.md#GrooveJoint2D_property_length) along the joint's local Y axis.
